posts.message: معشر الجيكس.. عايزين نهجم على sublime text ونطلب منهم كلنا مرة واحدة يضيفوا دعم العربي  :/

An interesting discussion on HN is taking place over HipChat's new terms of service. The argument is around account owners (namely company management) gaining access to private 1-on-1 chats. Some argue against it [0], some argue for it [1][2].
Both of which are making very compelling cases, the policy is standard in almost all communication policies in corporate environments, likely the most common reason for the lack of such policy in startups is the legal overhead to produce, maintain and enforce one (despite what an entrepreneur might actually say, making a case that we're a startup and we do things differently)

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=7649524

[0] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=7650163
[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=7650457
[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=7650514

cc: Mohamed Meligy you guys use HipChat too, right?

posts.message:
(Hiring)
job Title: senior php developer (Team Leader)
need: 1 developer 
Location: online
Working Hours: 8 hours
Days Off: Friday
Qualifications:
- practical experience in PHP development for large-scale, web-based applications using PHP Frameworks especially with codeigniter Framework.
- Solid grounding in the fundamentals of Object-Oriented Design and design patterns.
- Front-end skills with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and XML.
- Extensive knowledge of SQL databases - MySql is required.
- experience more than 3 years.
CVs to be sent to : php-hossam@tl4s.com (please write "senior PHP developer" in mail subject)

Juniors/seniors. please read this article.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Teach Yourself Programming in Ten Years
http://norvig.com/21-days.html

المقال مترجم للعربيه: http://myahya.org/writing/21-days/
